Welcome to MINDShare!

This year’s theme is MINDmatters: P3

MINDmatters represents our focus this year. It’s a time for us to celebrate the significance of what we do – our work, our people, our mission, our customers, donors, schools, students, parents, educators… everything and everyone matters!

At MINDShare 2018, what you’ll experience is represented by P3: Purpose, People and Passion.

  • Purpose – getting back to our mission and what drives us to do what we do.
  • People – identifying ways to support our customers, our donors and each other.
  • Passion – we are all here because we believe in our cause and we know that what we do makes a difference.

The #mindshare2018 channel on Slack is the place for all things MINDShare 2018. Please post updates, fabulous photos and any event questions in the channel. Share your MIND love!
